name: Pace-ICMP
short_description: Pace-ICMP is a utility that can allow X amount of ICMP (ping, etc) packets travel to the host, once X is exceeded, all ICMP traffic is blocked. This allows ping and traceroute functionality, while still protecting you against ICMP attacks.
